# RPKM (reads per kilo base of exon model per million mapped reads)
$$RPKM = \frac{read \space counts}{sequencing \space deeps* gene \space length(in \space kb)} * 10^6$$

# CPM (counts per million)
$$CPM = \frac{read \space counts}{sequencing \space deeps} *10^6$$

# FPKM (fragments per kilobase of exon model per million mapped fragments)
$$FPKM = \frac{fragments}{sequencing \space deeps * gene \space length (in \space kb)} * 10^6$$

# TPM (transcripts per million)
$$TPM = \frac{fragments}{sequencing \space deeps} * 10^6$$
